title: Accounts Payable: A Guide to Running an Efficient Department

note: and two-day seminars given throughout the year at many locations. One instructor usually teaches the entire session.
title: Conferences IOMA/IMI Managing Accounts Payable—held at two locations in the fall, usually Chicago and San Francisco, and two in the spring, usually New York and a southern California city. Each has many different speakers. IOMA/IMI Advanced Accounts Payable Institute—held each June at various locations. This event has many different speakers
